title: Celebs In Quarantine, IKEA Pizza Table 3.19.20
itunes:title: Celebs In Quarantine, IKEA Pizza Table 3.19.20
description:
In episode 590, Jack and Miles are joined by quarantine co-host Jamie Loftus to discuss the TDZ jobs reddit thread, Amazon hiring but not caring about coronavirus spread in warehouses, the Democratic primaries, racism in the time of Coronavirus, how the White House plans on helping, bored celebrities, Pizza Hut joining forces with IKEA, things to do while in quarantine, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Miles was asking about everyone’s job situation
  2. Amazon’s warehouse workers sound alarms about coronavirus spread
  3. Amazon is hiring 100k new workers to meet demand
  4. Democratic primaries live updates: Sanders to assess his campaign in wake of three decisive wins by Biden on Tuesday
  5. Trump orders HUD to suspend evictions and foreclosures
  6. 'It's NOT racist!' Donald Trump lashes out as he is challenged on using 'Chinese virus,' saying Beijing did NOT give fair warning and doesn't condemn White House official who called it 'kung flu'
  7. How ugly could it get? Trump faces echoes of 1929 in coronavirus crisis.
  8. White House coronavirus plan aims to send $2,000 to many Americans, includes $300 billion for small businesses
  9. The Celebrities Are Bored
  10. Pizza Hut and IKEA collaborate on an awesome pizza that we’ll never get to eat
  11. Pizza Hut and IKEA are now making furniture together, too
  12. IKEA closes all U.S. stores, China back up except for Wuhan store
  13. Couple Have Dizzy Blindfolded Pillow Fight
  14. WATCH: EarthGang - Up | A COLORS SHOW

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
